title: fluid.bufonsetfeature
description: The `fluid.bufonsetfeature` object calculates various spectral difference features and metrics from an audio buffer, such as Energy, HFC, and SpectralFlux. It is primarily used for generating a novelty or difference curve, which is a crucial step in detecting onsets within audio signals. This object provides parameters for windowing, hop size, FFT settings, and metric selection to fine-tune the analysis.
